PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-04422016-06-03,  ,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Narcotic Control Regulations (Opium Poppy)
PrecisRegulations Amending the NARCOTIC CONTROL REGULATIONS (OPIUM POPPY) in order to explicitly prohibit anyone from cultivating, propagating or harvesting opium poppy for any purpose other than scientific research.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0123 Publication Date: 2016-06-15
